title: British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
text:
British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades

Forex 1 hour ago (Oct 17, 2019 18:05)

© Reuters. British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades LONDON, Oct 17 (Reuters) - The British pound jumped more

than a percent against the dollar on Thursday after Britain

clinched a Brexit deal with the European Union. Sterling has gained six percent against the dollar over the

last six trading sessions , its biggest rising streak

since October 1985, according to Refinitiv data.





British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
description: British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
